column1: * 1914 - J.R.R. Tolkien submits an essay on his favourite poet
column3: to the Oxford University Essay Club.

column1: * 1937 - Tolkiens poem "Iúmonna Gold Galdre Bewunden" is re-published in The Oxford Magazine.
* 2010 - The History of Middle-earth is re-released in hardcover.
** Gandalf and Erkenbrand show up and finish the Battle of the Hornburg.
** Théoden and Gandalf set out for Isengard with a guard of twenty Rohirrim. They pass the tombs of the Fords of Isen.
** The River Isen is restored to its original course.

column2: Samwise Gamgee and Gollum reach the slag-mounds on the edge of the Desolation of the Black Gate.Category:Datesde:4. Märzfi:4. maaliskuuta
